quotes.message: Power over others is weakness disguised as strength.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Weakness is what brings ignorance, cheapness, racism, homophobia, desperation, cruelty, brutality, all these things that will keep a society chained to the ground, one foot nailed to the floor.
quotes.name: Henry Rollins

quotes.message: Every weakness contains within itself a strength.
quotes.name: Shusaku Endo

quotes.message: To share your weakness is to make yourself vulnerable; to make yourself vulnerable is to show your strength.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: No one wants to believe they are weak, but we all have weakness inside us. We have strength, too, but there are times when the circumstances in our lives are so overwhelming that we easily succumb to that weakness.
quotes.name: Sarah A. Denzil

quotes.message: If your weakness is love then you are extremely strong.
quotes.name: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

quotes.message: Power corrupts the few, while weakness corrupts the many.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: Don’t weaken yourself by surrendering to your weaknesses. Strengthen yourself by conquering your weaknesses.
quotes.name: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.message: A fear of weakness only strengthens weakness.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Build up your weaknesses until they become your strong points.
quotes.name: Knute Rockne

quotes.message: Tears shed for self are tears of weakness, but tears shed for others are a sign of strength.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Within our perceived weaknesses and imperfections lies the key to realizing our true strength.
quotes.name: Yongey Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.message: Credulity is the man's weakness, but the child's strength.
quotes.name: Charles Lamb

quotes.message: No one enjoys feeling weak, whether it is emotionally, spiritually or physically. There is something within the human spirit that wants to resist the thought of weakness. Many times this is nothing more than our human pride at work. Just as weakness carries a great potential for strength, pride carries an equally great potential for defeat.
quotes.name: Charles Stanley

quotes.message: Only strength can cooperate. Weakness can only beg.
quotes.name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.message: Weakness is subjective. We are weak for the people we love. And to others, we are the rigid mountains.
quotes.name: Dr. Upasana Gupta

quotes.message: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.name: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.message: All cruelty springs from weakness.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: A person’s strength was always his weakness, and vice versa.
quotes.name: Viet Thanh Nguyen

quotes.message: When you go looking for rescue, you end up trapped in your own weakness.
quotes.name: Deb Caletti

quotes.message: Love's weaknesses are better than hate's strengths.
quotes.name: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.message: Never be afraid to expose a weakness in yourself. Exposing a weakness is the beginning of strength.
quotes.name: Robert Anthony

quotes.message: To rush into explanations is always a sign of weakness.
quotes.name: Agatha Christie

quotes.message: Once we know our weaknesses they cease to do us any harm.
quotes.name: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.message: Weakness and ambivalence lead to war.
quotes.name: George H. W. Bush

quotes.message: Be careful who you share your weakness with. Some people can’t wait for the opportunity to use them against you.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Even the strongest enemy had a weakness.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: The weak may be joked out of anything but their weakness.
quotes.name: Johann Georg Ritter von Zimmermann

quotes.message: My strength and my weakness are twins in the same womb.
quotes.name: Marge Piercy

quotes.message: Having a soft heart in a cruel world is courage, not weakness.
quotes.name: Katherine Henson

quotes.message: Man's biological weakness is the condition of human culture.
quotes.name: Erich Fromm

quotes.message: Our strength grows out of our weakness.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: The acknowledgment of our weakness is the first step in repairing our loss.
quotes.name: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.message: Humility teaches courage. Weakness teaches strength. And grief teaches love. So you must treasure them, not hate yourself for them.
quotes.name: Umair Haque

quotes.message: Tears shed for another person are not a sign of weakness. They are a sign of a pure heart.
quotes.name: Jose N. Harris

quotes.message: Sometimes you don’t realize your own strength until you come face to face with your greatest weakness.
quotes.name: Susan Gale

quotes.message: Pessimism leads to weakness. Optimism leads to power.
quotes.name: William James
